name: Sellsword
flavor: An armed mercenary testing their luck.

features.name: Minion (4) - Passive
features.desc: The Sellsword is defeated when they take any damage. For every 4 damage a PC deals to the Sellsword, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Sellswords within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 3 physical damage each. Combine this damage.
